about.title: About!
about.text-1: This site is a fan-made, unofficial source of information for Nintendo's Splatoon 3. You might remember me from {0}!
about.text-special-thanks: Special thanks to all of the {0} who have helped improve the site, as well as the {1} and {2} projects for their work to make automated Nintendo Switch Online logins possible.
about.text-2: On the front end, this site was built with {0}, {1}, and {2}. Static assets are compiled using {3}.
about.text-3: On the back end, the data updaters and Twitter bot were written using {0}.
about.text-4: The Twitter bot at {0} uses {1} to automatically generate images for each tweet.
about.text-5: This site is completely open source. You can view the source here on {0}.
about.subtitle-3: Can I use data from this site in my own project?
about.text-6: Yes! I love seeing all the creative projects people come up with that use this site's data.
about.text-7: Please see the {0} page for a list of all available endpoints.
about.text-8: Please feel free to contact me on Twitter at {0} or via {1} if you have any other questions!

footer.term: This website is not affiliated with Nintendo. All product names, logos, and brands are property of their respective owners.
